name: Génifique Repair SC
longDescription: Génifique Repair Night Cream, the anti-ageing night cream from LORA. Wake up to refreshed, younger-looking skin with our Night Cream.

name: Génifique Repair SC
longDescription: Génifique Repair Night Cream, the anti-ageing night cream from LORA. Wake up to refreshed, younger-looking skin with our Night Cream.

name: Nutrix Royal Mains
longDescription:
Nutrix Royal Hand Cream nourishes skin with moisture and leaves your hands with a feeling of comfort.

The skin feels soft, supple and moisturised.

name: Nutrix Royal Mains
longDescription: Nutrix Royal Hand Cream nourishes skin with moisture and leaves your hands with a feeling of comfort. The skin feels soft, supple and moisturised.

name: Nutrix Royal
longDescription:
Nutrix Royal nourishing and hydrating day cream relieves dry to very dry skin.

Skin instantly feels soft and protected from the elements while fine lines and tightness look smoothed away.

Experience intensely hydrated skin for 24 hours. Tested under dermatological control.

name: Nutrix Royal
longDescription:
Nutrix Royal nourishing and hydrating day cream relieves dry to very dry skin.

Skin instantly feels soft and protected from the elements while fine lines and tightness look smoothed away.

Experience intensely hydrated skin for 24 hours. Tested under dermatological control.

name: Nutrix
longDescription: Nutrix rich face cream nourishes the skin with moisture and relieves feeling of discomfort and tightness. Ideal for sensitive or irritated skin.

name: Nutrix
longDescription: Nutrix Rich Cream nourishes the skin with moisture and relieves feeling of discomfort and tightness, while maintaining elasticity and suppleness. Ideal for very dry, sensitive or irritated skin.

name: Artliner
longDescription:
Create a winged eye look or intense lines with LORA’s liquid eyeliner, Artliner.

With a soft foam tip, Artliner helps you apply eyeliner with precision. The combination of our formula of rich colour pigments and clever technology makes every eye look last.

HOW TO APPLY ARTLINER
• Shake gently prior to use.
• Dab onto the base of the upper eyelashes.
• Apply gently for a fine line.
• Apply extra pressure for thicker line.

name: Artliner
longDescription:
Create a winged eye look or intense lines with LORA’s liquid eyeliner, Artliner.

With a soft foam tip, Artliner helps you apply eyeliner with precision. The combination of our formula of rich colour pigments and clever technology makes every eye look last.

HOW TO APPLY ARTLINER
• Shake gently prior to use.
• Dab onto the base of the upper eyelashes.
• Apply gently for a fine line.
• Apply extra pressure for thicker line.

name: Définicils
longDescription:
Définicils mascara provides lash separation, shapes and defines to create longer-looking and beautiful lashes from base to tip without clumping. The grooved bristles on the patented brush evenly distribute mascara along the entire lash from root to tip. Separates the look of eye lashes for a natural-looking, even finish every time.

HOW TO APPLY DÉFINICILS
Apply mascara from the base of the lashes to the tips using zigzag movements. When you apply mascara this way, you will be able to direct and perfectly distribute the texture of mascara onto the lashes. Apply mascara from the base of lashes to the tips using zigzag movements.

PRO TIP:
Never pump the wand as this will introduce air into the barrel of the mascara which can dry out the product.

name: Trésor Body Lotion
longDescription:
Love is a treasure.

This silky-soft, oil-free emulsion is refreshingly light to gently wrap the body in the soothing scents of TRÉSOR. Its moisturising and softening properties leaves the skin feeling supple, satiny.

Its subtle fragrance is an infinite source of pleasure for your entire body.

name: Trésor
longDescription:
Love is a treasure.

This silky-soft, oil-free emulsion is refreshingly light to gently wrap the body in the soothing scents of TRÉSOR. Its moisturising and softening properties leaves the skin feeling supple, satiny.

Its subtle fragrance is an infinite source of pleasure for your entire body.

name: La Nuit Trésor
longDescription:
Discover La Nuit Trésor, a sultry, smouldering perfume for women with notes of fresh raspberry, frankincense, and vanilla, with a bewitching heart of Black Rose essence.
This new fragrance is LORA’s first ‘Gourmand Woody Floriental’ perfume, a scent of passionate love - as showcased in the new advert featuring the beautiful Penelope Cruz.
The La Nuit Trésor bottle is shaped like a black diamond, the most mysterious and precious of all diamonds, and adorned with a black rose choker as a symbol of elegance.
The scent
This rich and exquisite women’s perfume was crafted by two master perfumers who combined their craftsmanship to create La Nuit Trésor Eau de Parfum.
Beginning with a burst of delicious raspberry, the notes of a Damascena rose have then been enhanced to give the fragrance a deep and mysterious scent. Vanilla, grown on the petals of an orchid in Tahiti, gives the fragrance a solar and radiant note.
Olfactory Category: Gourmand Woody Floriental
Top Notes: Raspberry, Lychee & Bergamot
Heart Notes: Frankincense & Rose
Base Notes: Vanilla Tahitensis, Patchouli, Papyrus

name: Hydra Zen Anti-Stress Rich Cream
longDescription:
Hydra Zen Anti-Stress Rich Cream treats dry skin with an intense boost of hydration. LORA's moisturising and soothing skincare cream with Hyaluronic Acid.

Soothes sensitive skin and protects from the effects of environmental stress. Enjoy softer, smoother feeling skin with a radiant complexion.

name: Hydra Zen Neurocalm™ - Dry Skin
longDescription:
Hydra Zen Anti-Stress Rich Cream treats dry skin with an intense boost of hydration. LORA's moisturising and soothing skincare cream with Hyaluronic Acid.

Soothes sensitive skin and protects from the effects of environmental stress. Enjoy softer, smoother feeling skin with a radiant complexion.

name: Hydra Zen Beauty Balm Neurocalm™ BB Cream
longDescription: Hydra Zen Beauty Balm Cream combines skincare and Makeup expertise. It is a soothing, multi-benefit tinted cream that in a single step moisturises, protects, unifies, boosts radiance and conceals imperfections of your skin. Its light, melting texture moisturises instantly for up to 24 hours and provides even coverage. This beauty balm cream leaves skin feeling comfortable, soft, supple and feeling soothed. With mineral pigments, Hydra Zen Beauty Balm unifies the complexion and dresses the skin with an illuminating natural veil to enhance the skin’s radiance. Available in 3 shades.

name: Hypnôse Doll Eyes Palettes
longDescription:
Unveil a wide-eyed look with Hypnôse Palette.

Create a range of looks with fresh and natural shades using our versatile natural colour palette, professionally inspired applicators and step-by-step techniques.

HOW TO APPLY HYPNÔSE PALETTE
• Apply the eye shadow dry for blendable, buildable colour, or use wet for deeper colour intensity.
• Our innovative “wet” eyeshadow technology allows for a range of effects and intensities with a multi-dimensional, even texture.

name: Hydra Zen Anti-Stress Fluid
longDescription:
Hydra Zen Anti-Stress Fluid intensely moisturises and lastingly soothes the face, leaving it soft, smooth and radiant.

The delicious Oil-in-Water texture melts onto the skin. It features a unique technology to provide intense, immediate and continuous moisturisation and soothe sensitive skin.

name: Hydra Zen Neurocalm Fluid Cream
longDescription:
Hydra Zen Anti-Stress Fluid intensely moisturises and lastingly soothes the face, leaving it soft, smooth and radiant.

The delicious Oil-in-Water texture melts onto the skin. It features a unique technology to provide intense, immediate and continuous moisturisation and soothe sensitive skin.

name: Rénergie French Lift™
longDescription:
Rénergie French Lift is LORA's 1st V-shaped cream for a re-firmed looking face.

It tackles loss of firmness, wrinkles and fine lines, loss of radiance. This product is inspired by the precise and refined French lifting techniques, known for its natural looking results.

The skin seems re-energised and more radiant.

name: Renergie French Lift™
longDescription:
Rénergie French Lift is LORA's 1st V-shaped cream for a re-firmed looking face.

It tackles loss of firmness, wrinkles and fine lines, loss of radiance. This product is inspired by the precise and refined French lifting techniques, known for its natural looking results.

The skin seems re-energised and more radiant.

name: Belle de Teint
longDescription:
Because a healthy glow always starts with healthy skin, and because a beautiful and smooth skin reflects the light better, LORA unveils Belle de Teint – LORA's first healthy skin powder that instantly blurs all imperfections with natural coverage, both adding colour to the complexion and improving skin texture.

THE INCREDIBLE RESULTS OF BELLE DE TEINT
1. RADIANCE: Radiant and luminous complexion, dazzling
2. ANTI-FATIGUE: Tiredness is stamped out, skin is refreshed, relaxed lines
3. HEALTHY LOOK: Weightless healthy glow makeup result
4. EVENNESS: Perfectly flawless skin, zero redness
5. SMOOTHING: Smooth and velvety skin, visibly reduced pores (blurring technology)
6. PROTECTION: Skin protected against daily external aggressions

Belle de Teint ultra fine powder comes in 8 “pastel tan” shades that reveal natural light for every skin tone.

SMART TIPS:
• The warm shades help create healthy skin that feels bare to the touch.
• The cool shade 01 is ideal for neutralising warm skin tones and mattifying after applying foundation.

name: Rénergie Nuit
longDescription:
Rénergie Nuit replenishes skin cells with the energy they need to repair and restructure themselves during the night.

In the morning, your skin looks smoother and rested. Night after night, your facial features seem less lined, wrinkles and fine lines are reduced and your skin is firm.

A gentle exfoliant eliminates excess cells and evens out the complexion.

This savvy cocktail is combined with Vitamin E, renowned for its anti-free radical and antioxidant properties, and hydrating active ingredients for optimum comfort.

name: Rénergie Nuit
longDescription:

name: Rénergie Multi-Lift Crème Légère
longDescription:
Reveal firmer, denser, and tighter looking skin, as if lifted, with Rénergie Multi-Lift Cream for Dry Skin, anti-wrinkle face cream from LORA.

Our anti-ageing skincare enriched with Multi-Tension technology firms skin. Facial zones look visibly tightened, wrinkles and fine lines appear smoother.

Experience suppler, smoother-looking skin replumped with moisture with Rénergie Multi-Lift Cream for Dry Skin.

Dermatologically tested.

name: Rénergie Multi-Lift Light Cream
longDescription:
Reveal firmer, denser, and tighter looking skin, as if lifted, with Rénergie Multi-Lift Cream for Dry Skin, anti-wrinkle face cream from LORA.

Our anti-ageing skincare enriched with Multi-Tension technology firms skin. Facial zones look visibly tightened, wrinkles and fine lines appear smoother.

Experience suppler, smoother-looking skin replumped with moisture with Rénergie Multi-Lift Cream for Dry Skin.

Dermatologically tested.

name: Ombre Hypnôse Stylo
longDescription:
Effortless long-wearing eyshadow cream stick.

A light-wearing creamy texture that glides on and adheres to the eyelid, 

leaving an even finish and incredible pigmented pay-off that lasts all day long.

name: Rénergy 3D Yeux
longDescription: Rénergy 3D Yeux is designed for men 40+ years old, and targets the signs of ageing. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Rénergy 3D Eye
longDescription: Rénergy 3D Yeux is designed for men 40+ years old, and targets the signs of ageing. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Rénergie Multi-Lift Crème Riche
longDescription:
Rénergie Multi-Lift Redefining Lifting Cream, an anti-age moisturiser for dry skin.

The facial moisturiser works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Skin feels firmer and tighter as if lifted. Skin surface contours look smoother. With SPF to protect the skin against premature ageing.  Enriched with Multi-Tension technology.

Use the moisturiser daily after your usual cleansing and toning routine. Apply a thin layer over the face, pressing into the skin and allow to absorb. Use Advanced Génifique Serum before your moisturiser. At night we recommend Rénergie Multi Lift Night Cream to complete your routine.


A rich texture to provide the skin with intense moisture and comfort. 
Dermatologically tested. 
Find the routine for you with our Skincare Finder.

name: Exfoliance Confort
longDescription:
Exfoliance Confort has a soft, creamy formula, packed with gently exfoliating micro-spheres to remove dull skin layers and impurities, while respecting the needs of dry skin.

Infused with moisturising agents, Exfoliant Confort helps diminish dehydration to leave skin feeling smooth, comfortable and clean.

name: Exfoliance Confort
longDescription:
Exfoliance Confort has a soft, creamy formula, packed with gently exfoliating micro-spheres to remove dull skin layers and impurities, while respecting the needs of dry skin.

Infused with moisturising agents, Exfoliant Confort helps diminish dehydration to leave skin feeling smooth, comfortable and clean.

name: Advanced Génifique Sérum
longDescription:
Advanced Génifique is our #1 serum for younger-looking and glowing skin with over 7,000 5-star reviews.

A serum suitable for every woman: all ethnicities, ages, and every skin type - dry, combination/normal and oily.

An important 1st step of every beauty routine, Advanced Génifique Serum targets key signs of youthful-looking skin: texture, fine lines, wrinkles, radiance and clarity. Reveal your skin's glow by using it morning and night.

Our serum is a powerhouse: patented and enriched with hyaluronic acid and probiotic fragments.

Clinically proven results.

name: Flash Bronzer Self-Tanning Face Gel
longDescription:
Flash Bronzer Self-Tanning Face Gel provides an even tan, that looks natural and intense.

The face looks radiant within a few hours. A fresh, gliding texture that can be applied in the blink of an eye and dries quickly. A formula that nourishes with moisture and combines DHA (self-tanning ingredient) and vitamin E.
